title: 1985년 United States v. Luis Angel Echeverri-Jaramillo 사건
summary: 미국 USA, Federal 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: United States v. Luis Angel Echeverri-Jaramillo. 판결일: 1985-11-21. 법원: Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: UNITED STATES of America, Appellee, v. Luis Angel ECHEVERRI-JARAMILLO, Appellant
**판결일**: 1985-11-21
**법원**: Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit
**관할**: USA, Federal

**판사**: Butzner, Murnaghan, Phillips

## 변호인

Michael Murchison (Murchison, Taylor & Shell, Wilmington, N.C., on brief) for appellant., Sara Criscitelli, Washington, D.C. (Samuel T. Currin, U.S. Atty., Raleigh, N.C., Samuel Rosenthal, Chief, Appellate Section, Washington, D.C., on brief) for appellee.

## 인용

- 777 F.2d 933

## 판결문 요약

777 F.2d 933
    19 Fed. R. Evid. Serv. 1106
    UNITED STATES of America, Appellee,v.Luis Angel ECHEVERRI-JARAMILLO, Appellant.
    No. 85-5053.
    United States Court of Appeals, Fourth Circuit.
    Argued Sept. 13, 1985.Decided Nov. 21, 1985.
    
      Michael Murchison (Murchison, Taylor & Shell, Wilmington, N.C., on brief) for appellant.
      Sara Criscitelli, Washington, D.C.  (Samuel T. Currin, U.S. Atty., Raleigh, N.C., Samuel Rosenthal, Chief, Appellate Section, Washington, D.C., on brief) for appellee.
      Before PHILLIPS and MURNAGHAN, Circuit Judges, and BUTZNER, Senior Circuit Judge.
      MURNAGHAN, Circuit Judge:
    
    
      1
      The defendant, Luis Angel Echeverri-Jaramillo ("Echeverri") appeals from his conviction 1) of conspiracy to possess with intent to distribute cocaine (a Schedule II narcotic controlled substance) in violation of 21 U.S.C. Sec. 846;  2) of possession with intent to distribute cocaine in violation of 21 U.S.C. Sec. 841(a)(1);  and 3) of interstate travel to promote distribution of narcotics in violation of 18 U.S.C. Sec. 1952(a).
    
    I.
    
      2
      Echeverri, a Columbian national, traveled in September 1984 from Manchester, New Hampshire to Wilmington, North Carolina, where he arrived on September 19th.  In a Wilmington bar, Echeverri met some crewmen from the Magrunel, a Columbian vessel and the bartender, Norma Saquarella.  Echeverri translated for the crewmen at the bar and the group, including Saquarella, ...
